description:
GTM Cloud Partnerships Director


My client specializes in using advanced Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence to classify and secure unstructured data in real-time. Their platform is designed to discover, categorize, and classify documents and emails across an entire environment, both on-premises and in the cloud. These classifications are critical for enforcing protection on sensitive data, while also providing comprehensive risk and compliance assessments.


About the Role:

As they continue to expand their influence in the cloud data security sector, they are in search of a highly experienced professional to take on the role of GTM Director, Partnership Lead. This pivotal role focuses on developing and executing strategic go-to-market plans while spearheading key partnerships with leading cloud providers. The ideal candidate will have extensive experience working with top-tier DSPM providers, coupled with a proven ability to drive and manage successful partnerships within the cloud ecosystem.


Key Responsibilities:


  • Strategic GTM Leadership: Develop and implement go-to-market strategies for our cloud products, with a particular emphasis on platforms like Google Cloud Platform (GCP) and Amazon Web Services (AWS).
  • Partnership Development: Identify and establish new business opportunities in the cloud market, aligning with our core competencies in data security and governance.
  • Stakeholder Engagement: Cultivate and maintain strong relationships with key stakeholders at cloud service providers and within client organizations to enhance and expand business opportunities.
  • Product Collaboration: Work closely with the product development team to communicate market demands and customer feedback, thereby influencing the roadmap and feature enhancements of our cloud offerings.
  • Marketing Collaboration: Partner with marketing teams to create compelling campaigns and materials that effectively communicate the value and uniqueness of our cloud solutions.
  • Deal Leadership: Lead negotiations and close high-profile deals, ensuring alignment with the company's revenue targets and strategic objectives.
  • Sales Enablement: Provide continuous training and support to the sales team, enhancing their ability to effectively sell and support our cloud-based products.


Qualifications:


  • Minimum of 5 years of experience in sales or business development, specifically within the cloud computing sector.
  • Demonstrated success in generating revenue through cloud services and consistently achieving or exceeding sales targets.
  • In-depth understanding of data security or data governance products, with substantial experience in these areas.
  • Exceptional relationship-building skills with a well-established network in cloud computing and experience managing significant customer accounts.
  • Strong analytical and strategic thinking abilities, with a proven capability to craft and implement comprehensive business strategies.
  • Excellent communication and presentation skills, with the ability to convey complex technical concepts in a clear and persuasive manner.
  • Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, IT, or a related field; a Master’s degree is preferred.


If interested please apply for a confidential chat.
